input_text.Prompt:
Using the item keywords and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Fishman Fission Bass Powerchord FX Pedal

Item keywords:
Creates stacked harmonies above the root note: Octave up, octave and 5th up, 4th and octave up
Unique footswitch LEDs let you "see" the harmony before you kick it on
Noise Gate control, Overdrive control, Tone control, and Effects Level control
Single 1/4" input with trim control accepts active or passive instruments.
Battery Life: 20 hours
Adding stacked harmonies over their bass lines
Through an intuitive set of controls and footswitches, several combinations of octaves, 4th and 5th above the root note combine to produce power chords or octave-up effects
When the effect is off, the LEDs dim making it easy to set up a harmony before you kick on the chord.
Its also a multi-effect pedal with up to 3 voices of harmony, adjustable noise gate, overdrive, tone and effect level
This power-effect combo gives you creative control over anything from subtle octaves to thick, grinding effects

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Fishman Fission Bass Powerchord FX Pedal is a unique and versatile pedal that adds stacked harmonies and octaves to your bass line. It features a unique footswitch LED system that allows you to "see" the chord before you kick it on. The pedal offers a wide range of tonal possibilities, from subtle octaves to thick, grinding effects. It also includes a noise gate, overdrive, tone, and effects level control, giving you complete control over your sound. With up to 20 hours of battery life, this pedal is a must-have for any bassist looking to add new layers and complexity to their playing.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
